name: Pico Pong
description:
Pico Train Assets

This is just a small ping pong game for pico 8. It was made with the tutorial from Pico 8 Fanzine 1

Improvments
  • Start game intro
  • Game Over intro
  • Game Over sound
  • Multi bounce fixed
